thread.title: BRIEF-Genuine Parts Company Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.73

title: BRIEF-Genuine Parts Company Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.73
text: February 20, 2018 / 1:53 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Genuine Parts Company Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.73 Reuters Staff Feb 20 (Reuters) - Genuine Parts Co: * GENUINE PARTS COMPANY REPORTS 2017 SALES AND EARNINGS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.73 * Q4 SALES ROSE 11.3 PERCENT TO $4.2 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.60 TO $5.75 INCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.19 INCLUDING ITEMS * SEES FY 2018 SALES UP 12 TO 13 PERCENT * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.07, REVENUE VIEW $4.05 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.83, REVENUE VIEW $18.37 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
